name: Duosion
description: The Mitosis Pokémon. When their brains, now divided in two, are thinking the same thoughts, these Pokémon exhibit their maximum power.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather-related moves and phenomena like Hail, Weather Ball, etc.

abilities.name: Magic Guard
abilities.description: If this Pokémon is subjected to a move that forces it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage on a success.

abilities.name: Regenerator
abilities.description: Once per long rest, this Pokémon regains hit points equal to its level when it returns to its Pokéball.
